name: break_even_analysis
description: Calculate the break-even occupancy and RevPAR for a property given its cost structure, ADR, and financing terms. Determines the minimum occupancy at which the property covers all operating expenses, management fees, and debt service. Also computes cash-flow break-even (including debt service) vs. operating break-even (NOI = 0). Useful for stress testing and underwriting.

days_per_month.description: Days per month for room revenue calculation (industry standard 30.5)

variable_cost_rate.description: Total variable operating costs as percentage of room revenue (e.g. 0.35 = 35%)

fixed_costs_monthly.description: Total monthly fixed operating costs in dollars (admin, insurance, taxes, etc.)

management_fee_rate.description: Total management fee rate as percentage of revenue (base + incentive combined estimate)

ffe_reserve_rate.description: FF&E reserve as percentage of revenue

monthly_debt_service.description: Monthly total debt service (interest + principal). 0 for all-cash properties.

ancillary_revenue_pct.description: Non-room revenue as a percentage of room revenue (events + F&B + other combined)

operating_break_even.description: Break-even where NOI = 0 (covers operating expenses and fees, excludes debt service)

occupancy.description: Minimum occupancy for positive cash flow after debt service and taxes

cash_flow_break_even.description: Break-even where Cash Flow = 0 (covers everything including debt service and taxes)

current_occupancy_cushion.description: Current occupancy minus break-even occupancy (in percentage points)

revenue_cushion_pct.description: How much revenue can drop before hitting break-even

fixed_cost_up_10pct_break_even.description: Break-even occupancy if fixed costs increase 10%
